description: Get a short-lived ticket for WebSocket subscription authentication (same as v1, in v2 namespace)

main.description: Get a short-lived ticket for WebSocket subscription authentication. Call this via PDS proxy, then connect directly to the MLS DS WebSocket endpoint with the ticket.

convoIds.description: Conversation IDs to subscribe to. If omitted, subscribes to all user conversations.

ticket.description: Short-lived JWT ticket for WebSocket authentication

endpoint.description: WebSocket endpoint URL to connect to

expiresAt.description: Ticket expiration time (typically 30 seconds from issuance)

errors.name: NotMember
errors.description: User is not a member of one or more specified conversations
